metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21419 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Eventlet is a concurrent networking library for Python. A websocket peermay exhaust memory on Eventlet side by sending very large websocket frames.Malicious peer may exhaust memory on Eventlet side by sending highlycompressed data frame. A patch in version 0.31.0 restricts websocket frameto reasonable limits. As a workaround, restricting memory usage via OSlimits would help against overall machine exhaustion, but there is noworkaround to protect Eventlet process.

criterions.comment: python-eventlet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
